definition: to spur on/to urge on/to encourage sb (e.g. to make progress)
whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.english: The great ambition is spurring him on.
I-checking in China is which involves improving China.
sentences.chinese: 中国的投行是鞭策中国增进。
她的仔细认真成为对我的鞭策。

sentences.english: He likes to encourage himself with these famous words and meaningful sentences.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢用这些名言佳句来鞭策自己。

sentences.english: Examine the Law and let it strike your heart to lead you to repentance.
sentences.chinese: 查考其中的律法并让它鞭策你的内心，引导你悔改。

sentences.english: Shapers are the dynamic whip-crackers who provoke their team into action.
sentences.chinese: 推进者是充满活力的鞭策者，能激发团队投入行动。

sentences.english: We can spur grelocated on deeds thlocated on history will mark declistinges effectively as centuries from now.
sentences.chinese: 我们能鞭策将会被历史永世铭刻的壮伟的事业。

sentences.english: Thank you Ms. Chen Ying for your encouragement and urges.
sentences.chinese: 感谢中国企联陈英女士的鼓励和鞭策。

sentences.english: I enjoy the challenge, the excitement, and the opportunity for growth that my work provides.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢工作给我的鞭策，激励和上进的机会。

sentences.english: For nonconformity, the world whips you with its displeasure.
sentences.chinese: 只因不随俗，整个世界都不悦鞭策着你。

sentences.english: It’s a mistake to try to push yourself too hard when trying to build self-discipline.
sentences.chinese: 当建立自律时，你不能过度地鞭策自己。

sentences.english: He kept on riding and riding, whipping the horse to go as fast as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持骑着，鞭策着马儿尽可能地快跑。

definition: to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to rouse to vigorous action/energetic mood
to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
to guard against pride and impatience (idiom); to remain modest and keep cool
